summary: A Kabbadi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.
cast: Mahesh Babu|Bhoomika Chawla|Prakash Raj|Joy Badlani|Chandramohan|Rajan P. Dev|Geetha|Baby Niharika|Venkateswara Rao Paruchuri|Mukesh Rishi|Telangana Sakuntala|Dharmavarapu Subramanyam
title: Okkadu
